languages.text: Огромные бобины тянут бумажные ленты без видимой пользы, заставляя подумать, какие отличные из них вышли бы катки для танковых траков.
The enormous reels are perpetually dragging the paper tapes along without any apparent practical reason, leaving one to think about how they could make for perfectly good rollers for tank treads.
languages.original_text: Огромные бобины тянут бумажные ленты без видимой пользы, заставляя подумать, какие отличные из них вышли бы катки для танковых траков.

traits.locale_text: The enormous reels are perpetually dragging the paper tapes along without any apparent practical reason, leaving one to think about how they could make for perfectly good rollers for tank treads.

The enormous reels are perpetually dragging the paper tapes along without any apparent practical reason, leaving one to think about how they could make for perfectly good rollers for tank treads.

languages.text: Die riesigen Rollen transportieren die Lochstreifen ohne ersichtlichen Grund weiter und erwecken den Anschein, als würden sie sich vortrefflich für Panzerketten eigenen.
languages.original_text: The enormous reels are perpetually dragging the paper tapes along without any apparent practical reason, leaving one to think about how they could make for perfectly good rollers for tank treads.

traits.locale_text: Die riesigen Rollen transportieren die Lochstreifen ohne ersichtlichen Grund weiter und erwecken den Anschein, als würden sie sich vortrefflich für Panzerketten eigenen.

languages.text: Les énormes bobines avalent continuellement les bandes de papier sans logique apparente, ce qui laisse songeur quant à leur potentiel en tant que systèmes de roulement pour les chenilles des chars.
languages.original_text: The enormous reels are perpetually dragging the paper tapes along without any apparent practical reason, leaving one to think about how they could make for perfectly good rollers for tank treads.

traits.locale_text: Les énormes bobines avalent continuellement les bandes de papier sans logique apparente, ce qui laisse songeur quant à leur potentiel en tant que systèmes de roulement pour les chenilles des chars.

languages.text: Los enormes rollos arrastran el papel sin ton ni son, trayendo a tu mente la idea de que servirían mejor si se usaran para impulsar las orugas de un tanque.
languages.original_text: The enormous reels are perpetually dragging the paper tapes along without any apparent practical reason, leaving one to think about how they could make for perfectly good rollers for tank treads.

traits.locale_text: Los enormes rollos arrastran el papel sin ton ni son, trayendo a tu mente la idea de que servirían mejor si se usaran para impulsar las orugas de un tanque.

languages.text: 巨大なリールは、実用的な理由など何もなく紙テープをいつまでも引きずっていることから、戦車の踏みつぶし用ローラーとして問題なく仕えるのではないか、などと考えてしまう。
languages.original_text: The enormous reels are perpetually dragging the paper tapes along without any apparent practical reason, leaving one to think about how they could make for perfectly good rollers for tank treads.

traits.locale_text: 巨大なリールは、実用的な理由など何もなく紙テープをいつまでも引きずっていることから、戦車の踏みつぶし用ローラーとして問題なく仕えるのではないか、などと考えてしまう。

languages.text: 这些巨大的滚轴始终拖着看起来毫无意义的纸带，这不禁让人在想，说不定这些滚轴非常适合改造成坦克履带的滚筒。
languages.original_text: The enormous reels are perpetually dragging the paper tapes along without any apparent practical reason, leaving one to think about how they could make for perfectly good rollers for tank treads.

traits.locale_text: 这些巨大的滚轴始终拖着看起来毫无意义的纸带，这不禁让人在想，说不定这些滚轴非常适合改造成坦克履带的滚筒。

languages.text: Devasa makaralar, görünürde pratik hiçbir neden olmaksızın kâğıt şeritleri mütemadiyen sürüklüyor. İnsanı tank paletleri için nasıl da mükemmel birer silindir olabileceklerine dair düşünmeye itiyor.
languages.original_text: The enormous reels are perpetually dragging the paper tapes along without any apparent practical reason, leaving one to think about how they could make for perfectly good rollers for tank treads.
